August 20,1957
?5r. E. A, Hunger ford, Jr.
Metropolitan Educational Television Association
3U5 Sast U6th Street
New York 17, New York
Dear Mr. Hungerfordt
I have a copy of your August lUth letter to Harry Skornia about
the sample method you plan to use.
I*m asking Dr. Sam Becker of Iowa, to get in touch with you about
this problem. As a member of the Research Committee, I feel Sam
would be best qualified to work with you.
Sincerely,
Raymond £• Cneydleur, Chairman
NAEB Research Committee
c.c.
Dr. Sam L. Becker, Director
Television Center
State University of Iowa
Iowa City, Iowa
Sam:
Will you take a look at the attached material from Hungerford and
follow through on this?
It was good to have ycy.at Chicagol-l»m still waiting for a copy
of that budget from ^swT'but have decided not to delay getting out
the full report in order to have it in the hands of the committee by
Monday*s mail
